pages.about-us: About Us - Discover Flexure's Story and Commitment to Excellence Flexure HOME ABOUT US Products Contact MEN'S GEAR SALE New Arrivals Tops Bottoms Accessories EXPLORE COLLECTION WOMEN'S GEAR SALE New Arrivals Tops Bottoms Accessories EXPLORE COLLECTION GET ACTIVE THIS SUMMER CONTACT US FOR DETAILS UNLEASH YOUR POTENTIAL. Flexure is your premier destination for performance sportswear, designed to elevate your training and recovery: Perform, Prepare & Recover with Flexure. Established with a commitment to innovation and excellence in 2005, Flexure stands for quality and performance. We are dedicated to providing cutting-edge sportswear for athletes of all levels, from elite competitors to fitness enthusiasts. Flexure garments are engineered to optimize your performance and enhance your comfort during every workout. TECHNOLOGY & INNOVATION. WHAT SETS FLEXURE APART. Flexure has continually invested in research and development to push the boundaries of sportswear technology. Our fabrics undergo rigorous testing to ensure they meet the demands of athletes. From moisture-wicking properties to advanced compression features, Flexure garments are engineered to enhance your performance and recovery. Our commitment to quality extends beyond design; every Flexure garment is meticulously crafted and tested to ensure durability and comfort. Experience the difference with Flexure and unlock your true potential. SHOP NOW The Flexure website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Flexure will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our website. From our website, you can visit other websites by following hyperlinks to such external sites. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites. These links to other websites do not imply a recommendation for all the content found on these sites. Site owners and content may change without notice and may occur before we have the opportunity to remove a link which may have gone 'bad'. Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms which are beyond our control. Please be sure to check the Privacy Policies of these sites as well as their "Terms of Service" before engaging in any business or uploading any information. pages.privacy-policy: Flexure - Privacy Policy: Your Privacy Matters to Us Flexure HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Information Collection and Use: We collect personally identifiable information to improve our service. Log Data is collected to enhance user experience. Cookies: We use cookies to collect information and improve our service. You can choose to accept or refuse cookies, but some features may not work if cookies are disabled. Service Providers: Third-party companies may assist in providing or analyzing our service. They have access to Personal Information but are obligated to use it only for service-related tasks. Security: We strive to protect your Personal Information, but no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security. Links to Other Sites: We may link to third-party sites. Please review their Privacy Policies, as we have no control over their content or practices. Children's Privacy: Our service is not directed at children under 13. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided Personal Information, we delete it immediately. Changes to This Privacy Policy: We may update our Privacy Policy. Please review this page periodically for changes. Changes are effective immediately upon posting. Contact Us: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us. The Flexure website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Flexure DisclaimersPrivacy & PolicyTerms & Conditions
